Open Music Theory

An open-source, interactive textbook for undergraduate music theory.
#OpenMusicTheory

Table of Contents

Kris Shaffer, lead author & editor
Bryn Hughes, author
Brian Moseley, author
Robin Wharton, lead editor

Published by
Hybrid Pedagogy Publishing
